outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use torify for privacy. Experimental
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 480
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 800
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
headerSVG.comment: URL to a scalable vector graphic to use as the header
topImages.comment: List of URLs to randomly pick from for the top image
bottomImages.comment: List of URLs to randomly pick from for the bottom image
dividerHeight.comment: The height of the divider bar, in pixels. Use 0 for no divider bar between images
dividerBuffer.comment: The blank spacing above and below the divider bar separating images. Use 0 for no blank spacing
